jsxRuntimeDeclarationEmit.tsx(7,10): error TS7026: JSX element implicitly has type 'any' because no interface 'JSX.IntrinsicElements' exists.
jsxRuntimeDeclarationEmit.tsx(7,10): error TS2875: This JSX tag requires the module path 'react/jsx-runtime' to exist, but none could be found. Make sure you have types for the appropriate package installed.
jsxRuntimeDeclarationEmit.tsx(7,26): error TS7026: JSX element implicitly has type 'any' because no interface 'JSX.IntrinsicElements' exists.


==== jsxRuntimeDeclarationEmit.tsx (3 errors) ====
    // Test case to reproduce jsx-runtime declaration emit issue
    
    
    // This should trigger the jsx-runtime import without type annotation error
    
    export const FunctionComponent = () => {
      return <div>Hello World</div>
             ~~~~~
!!! error TS7026: JSX element implicitly has type 'any' because no interface 'JSX.IntrinsicElements' exists.
             ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

!!! error TS7026: JSX element implicitly has type 'any' because no interface 'JSX.IntrinsicElements' exists.
    }
    
    export const AnotherComponent = () => {
      return <FunctionComponent />
    }
